description: An ACL Notification maximum session reached signifies that
the number of ACL sessions has reached its configured limit

event.Summary: Number of ACL sessions reached maximum limit

description: An ACL Notification warning session reaching limit signifies that
the number of ACL sessions is near from its maximum configured
limit

event.Summary: Number of ACL sessions reaching maximum limit

description: An ACL Notification maximum half-session reached signifies that
the number of ACL half-sessions has reached its configured limit
as stateful inspection is enabled on the device

event.Summary: Number of ACL half-sessions reached maximum limit

description: An ACL Notification warning half-session reaching limit
signifies that the number of ACL half-sessions is near from
its configured limit. Note that this notification is received
only if stateful inspection is enabled on the device

event.Summary: Number of ACL half-sessions reaching maximum limit

description: An ACL Notification maximum session per host reached signifies that
the number of ACL sessions per host has reached its configured
limit for the host whose IP address is added to the notification
message. This trap is sent only if inspection per host and
stateful inspection is enabled

Summary.eval: ($v1 ne '') ? '$v1' : 'Number of ACL sessions per host reached maximum limit'

description: Textual representation of the event
variables.name: ONEACCESS-EVENTS-MIB::oacEventText

description: Provides the associated severity level used when generating
snmp traps. When the device generates a Trap-PDU into a
SNMPv2-Trap-PDU, and when it requires a severity level,
this variable is inserted before the last varbind.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-EVENTS-MIB::oacEventSeverityLevel

description: An ACL Notification maximum half-session per host reached signifies that
the number of ACL half-sessions per host has reached its configured limit
for the host whose IP address is added to the notification message. This
trap is sent only if inspection per host and stateful inspection
are enabled

event.Summary: Number of ACL half-sessions per host reached maximum limit
